content: this is a quick set of a dishtowel and dishcloths for your kitchen the simple pattern is both easy to keep track of and so satisfying as the pattern continues choose any number of colors to make the perfect set for your home both the dishtowel and dishcloths are worked from the bottom up in a mitered pattern using locking stitch markers will help keep track of the decreases the dishtowel includes a hanging loop with a button - perfect for using your fun button stash 2 balls of dishie will complete 1 dishtowel and 2 dishcloths **sizes** dishtowel approx 18 width × 19 length not including hanging loop dishcloth approx 10 width x 10 length
